name: Helen Brooks
message: Luna has been scratching her ears a lot lately and shaking her head. I checked her ears and they look red and inflamed. She also seems to be in pain when I touch them.

name: Kathryn Murphy
message: The best way to treat an ear infection is to visit your local vet clinic and get a prescription for ear drops. The ear drops will help clear the infection and reduce..

name: James Grey
message: You should follow the instructions on the ear drops label, but usually you need to apply them twice a day for 7 to 10 days. You should clean her ears once a day, preferably before applying the ear drops.

name: Jim Brown
message: Hi, I have a question about my cat.
